about_the_game:
More than survival games


As the Assemble team, we aim to offer you a game that is constantly renewed and provides different experiences. "Assemble" is a survival and action game that supports up to 7 players. It is not clear who will be the killer and who will be the victim. Whether you are a killer or a victim, you can always counteract. If you are tired of running away, this game is for you.

Our first killer in early access is "MORY"


Mory is a killer with an unfortunate life story. He is waiting for his victims in these cursed and forgotten lands. He has many different abilities to torture. Tasting them or make others taste them is up to you.

Are you prey or hunter?


There are multiple options for the survivors. If you want, you can end all this by hunting the killer, or you can run away.

Annoying people are not allowed!


We have no forgiveness for annoying people as in other multiplayer games. Once we complete the system we are working on, you will never meet these people again. GG!

Give us your feedback


You can always reach us on our Discord channel. We care about your ideas and consider them. We also have special surprises for our players who support us at the early access stage.

name: Assemble

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64xBit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 730
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The lowest graphic settings are taken as reference.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64xBit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel i7-6800K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or Amd Rx 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space

short_description: Assemble is a survival and horror game that supports up to 7 people with fast-paced gameplay. It offers much different gameplay with the new killer and characters to be added.
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, German
*languages with full audio support
